Posts.Content: Feb 14, 2009 01:55PM one_special_angel2006 wrote: Well i had my first injection of Neulasta and got severe pains in my right shoulder and upper chest...it also feels like my throat is closing up at times. Spent a morning in emerg and they did some tests and gave me a shot of DEMEROL with gravol...pain went away but i still get it at home. They gave me a RX for demerol so trying to use it at home when i need it. They say the first shot is the worse so hopefully my second one wont be will keep u posted and wish you all the best to a speedy recovery..One Special Angel
Posts.Title: is this Neulasta bone pain? bluewillow one_special_angel2006
